Spells:
Aid (C2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 temporary HP for 8 hr
Blade Barrier (C6 Evoc): R90' 100'x20'x5' blade wall provides 3/4 cover and inflicts 6d10 HP slashing (Dex half) for conc or 10 min
Bless (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for conc or 1 min
Blight (C4 [Blood Domain] Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Con half (plant Disadv, 64 HP on fail))
Clairvoyance (C3 Divi): R1 mile Self sees or hears remotely through invisible sensor for conc or 10 min
Contagion (C5 Necr): Touched poisoned, diseased for 7 dy after failing 3 Con saves (3 successes neg)
Crown Of Madness (C2 [Blood Domain] Ench): R120' Self directs target's attacks (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Daylight (C3 Evoc): R60' Target centers 60' radius bright light for 1 hr
Death Ward (C4 Abju): Touched keeps 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP for 8 hrs
Detect Evil And Good (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses aligned outsider, consecration, and desecration for conc or 10 min
Divination (C4 Divi): Self gains truthful answer about event up to 7 dy in the future
Dominate Person (C5 [Blood Domain] Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Forbiddance (C6 Abju): Touched 40000' sq bars teleport and portals, inflicts 5d10 HP radiant or necrotic on transit to chosen type for 1 dy
Geas (C5 Ench): R60' Target obeys command (Wis neg) for 30 dy
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc or 1 min
Haste (C3 [Blood Domain] Tran): R30' Willing target gains dbl Speed, +2 AC, Adv on Dex, and bonus action for conc or 1 min
Hold Monster (C5 [Blood Domain] Ench): R90' Immobilizes target (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Holy Aura (C8 Abju): 30' radius targets gain Adv on saves and blind fiends and undead with melee hit (Con neg); foes suffer Disadv on attacks
Locate Object (C2 Divi): Self learns location of named object or type w/in 1000' for conc or 10 min
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs small tear
Plane Shift (C7 Conj): Target or self and 8 willing others travel to another plane (Cha neg)
Prayer Of Healing (C2 Evoc): R60' 6 targets regain 2d8 + -2 HP
Protection From Evil And Good (C1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead, and those creatures suffer Disadv on attack on touched
Raise Dead (C5 Necr): Restores touched 10-day-old corpse to life
Ray Of Enfeeblement (C2 [Blood Domain] Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts half damage on Str weapons (Con neg) for conc or 1 min
Ray Of Sickness (C1 [Blood Domain] Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Con not poisoned)
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc or 1 min
Sanctuary (C1 Abju): R30' Foes of target attack another (Wis neg) for 1 min
Sending (C3 Evoc): Self exchanges 25-word message with known target
Sleep (C1 [Blood Domain] Ench): R90' 20' radius sleeps up to 5d8 HP of creatures, weakest first
Slow (C3 [Blood Domain] Tran): R120' 6 targets in 40' cu suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dex saves, and 1 action/rd (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched creature becomes stable
Stone Shape (C4 Tran): Reshapes touched medium-sized stone
Stoneskin (C4 [Blood Domain] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc or 1 hr
Symbol (C7 Abju): Inscribes touched w/permanent glyph that invokes magic effects
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
True Resurrection (C9 Necr): Restores touched or named 200-year-old corpse to life
Magic Notes:
Blood Puppet: R60' Use Channel Divinity to force Huge target to move half speed and attack (Con neg)
Bloodletting Focus: Harming spells inflict +(spell level + 2) HP necrotic
Crimson Bond: Channel Divinity with target blood to learn distance, direction, HP, and conditions for conc or 1 hr, suffer 2d6 HP necrotic to share sight or sound for 1 rd (Con ends)
Divine Intervention: 100% chance of deity help 1/wk
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Sanguine Recall: Recover up to 10 spell levels, suffer equal d6 HP damage
War Caster: Adv on concentration to maintain spell, cast when holding shield and/or weapon, use Reaction to cast as OA
